name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Blastmaster3000

spells.description: Use: Launch a random number of deadly grenades at your enemies, each dealing 271,413 Fire damage split between nearby targets caught in the blast. (1 Min Cooldown)

description: Could be single, maybe double, or if you're lucky, TRIPLE explosions!

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.
Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.
